thread.title: DL
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by DL

author: DL
title: DL
text: We just returned and highly recommend Leah Reeb,and Costa Rican Vacations. Leah always returned our calls/emails promptly, and the trip was exactly as described by her. The accomodations, airport pickup/dropoff, and transfers were spot on, and the drivers always early. I did not have to confirm travel once, as once you get your itinerary, it is confirmed for you ahead of time. I highly recommend Leah Reeb and her company.
